name: Load Enhanced Function IO Type
action: [IF](<*ISSELECTED(SerC_CG_IO_Family_Type.Turbomachinery)*>){<*CTX ( Container(SerC_RG_Enhanced_Function_IO_Cont).Load(Select top 10 IO_Type, red_is, future_red_is, non_red_is, red_nis, future_red_nis, non_red_nis, red_isltr, future_red_isltr, non_red_isltr,Rank from Enhanced_Function_IO WHERE Rank!='3' ) )*>}{<*CTX ( Container(SerC_RG_Enhanced_Function_IO_Cont).Load(Select top 10 IO_Type, red_is, future_red_is, non_red_is, red_nis, future_red_nis, non_red_nis, red_isltr, future_red_isltr, non_red_isltr,Rank from Enhanced_Function_IO WHERE IO_Type!='' ) )*>}[ENDIF]
